segments.text: Hey Joey, is this the bed where Olivia lost her virginity?
segments.speaker: Rachel

segments.text: I don't know, but one of the extras sure did!  Hey, listen    Rach. Thanks again for coming down to watch my scenes!
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: Oh, please!Honey, just the fact that you want me here to support    you, I'm...OH MY GOD!Is that Christian Sanders?He's so
segments.speaker: Rachel

segments.text: Oh, in my head he's done some pretty "not-gay-stuff"!
segments.speaker: Rachel

segments.text: Well, at the Christmas party him and Santa did some definitely    gay stuff!
segments.speaker: Joey
